/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on either side. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the city. The predominant colors in the image are gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the presence of trees lining the street. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life and architecture of Beijing, showcasing its blend of modernity and tradition.
